events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived yet and the tracking information hasn't been updated in days.
The issue has been categorized as a delivery delay based on the customer's report regarding shipping and tracking status.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in delivery and shipping issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help investigate why your order hasn't arrived yet.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number so I can check the shipping status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. I appreciate your help.
I've checked the tracking system; your package appears delayed due to carrier issues. We can either wait a few more days or issue a replacement shipment if preferred.
Thanks for the update. I would like to wait a couple more days before deciding on a replacement, please.
The package was delivered today. Please confirm once you receive it, and let us know if there's anything else we can do.
We are following up to ensure your delivery arrived and that you are satisfied with the service.
I received the package in good condition. Thanks for your support throughout the process!
The case has been closed following confirmation of successful delivery and customer satisfaction.
